org.smpp.util

Class ByteBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smpp.SmppObject
      • org.smpp.util.ByteBuffer

  • public class ByteBuffer
extends SmppObject
    Data buffer for queued writting and reading of binary data. Provides methods for appending several data types to the end of the buffer and removing them from the begenning of the buffer. Used for constructing and parsing binary PDUs.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.5 $
    Author:
    Logica Mobile Networks SMPP Open Source Team
